thread.title_full: young couple - vacations - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: nikolaosf821
title: young couple - vacations - Review
text: Nice and helpfull staff. Very good location. Five minutes on foot from metro station Tower Hill. A little bit expencive but its ok. We asked for a specific room and the reception staff helped us at once. We will stay at this hotel to the next trip to London
